IPersonSubscriber.summary: Interface that show method that can call from PersonaSubscriber.
IPersonSubscriber.remarks: can Read, ReadAll, Insert, Update, Delete.

Read.summary: send id of a person and read all information fort this person.

ReadAll.summary: call server asking the all people in the registry.

Insert.summary: call server actor to insert a people registry into db.

Update.summary: call server to update a registry in db.

Delete.summary: call db to delete registry in db.
